ErrorResponse.description: Error response returned when a request fails

info.description: The Stop Place Register provides access to public transportation infrastructure data across Norway, including stop places, quays, parkings, and related NeTEx entities. This API enables developers to query stop place information with details on location, accessibility features, transport modes, fare zones, and hierarchical relationships. Ideal for journey planning applications, transportation analysis, mobility services, and public transit integrations.
info.title: Stop Place Register

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of fare zones. Fare zones define geographic areas used for fare calculation and ticket pricing in public transport systems.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific fare zone IDs
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: Filter by transport authority references
parameters.name: authorityRefs

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of fare zones

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific fare zone including boundaries, member stop places, and authority information.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the fare zone
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific fare zone. Tracks changes to zone boundaries, pricing structures, or member stop places.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the fare zone
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a fare zone by ID and version number.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the fare zone
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

404.description: Fare zone or version not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of stop place groups providing logical collections of stop places for organizational purposes.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific group IDs
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of stop place groups

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific stop place group including its name, purpose, and list of member stop places.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place group
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Get group of stop places by ID

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tariff zone groups organizing fare zones into logical collections for ticketing and pricing purposes.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific tariff zone group IDs
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of tariff zone groups

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific tariff zone group including member zones and pricing relationships.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the tariff zone group
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Get group of tariff zones by ID

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of parking facilities including park-and-ride facilities and bike parking associated with public transport stops.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific parking IDs
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of parking facilities

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific parking facility including location, capacity, parking types, pricing, and accessibility features.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parking facility
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific parking facility. Tracks changes to capacity, pricing, or facility features.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parking facility
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a parking facility by ID and version number.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parking facility
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

404.description: Parking facility or version not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of quays. Quays represent specific boarding positions within a stop place, such as platforms at a train station or bus stands at a bus terminal.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific quay IDs
parameters.name: ids

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific quay by its unique identifier. Returns location, compass bearing, public code, accessibility features, and equipment.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the quay
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves the parent stop place that contains the specified quay. Useful for finding the complete context and location information for a specific platform.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the quay
parameters.name: id

404.description: Quay or stop place not found

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific quay. Tracks changes such as platform number changes, accessibility improvements, or equipment updates over time.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the quay
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a quay by ID and version number.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the quay
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of scheduled stop points. These are logical references used in route and timetable data that map to physical stop places.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of scheduled stop points

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific scheduled stop point by its unique identifier.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled stop point
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Get scheduled stop point by ID

get.description: Retrieves the physical stop place associated with a scheduled stop point. Maps the logical reference used in timetables to the actual physical infrastructure where passengers board vehicles.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled stop point in NeTEx format
parameters.name: id

example.message: Stop place for scheduled stop point 'RUT:ScheduledStopPoint:99999' not found

404.description: Scheduled stop point or associated stop place not found

get.summary: Get stop place for scheduled stop point

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of stop places with optional filtering. Stop places represent physical locations where passengers can board or alight from public transport vehicles. Results can be filtered by transport mode, stop place type, geographic location, and hierarchy. Supports both JSON (default) and XML formats via Accept header.

parameters.description: Maximum number of stop places to return per page
parameters.name: count

schema.description: Maximum number of stop places to return per page

parameters.description: Number of stop places to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

schema.description: Number of stop places to skip for pagination

parameters.description: Filter by specific stop place IDs
parameters.name: ids

schema.description: Filter by specific stop place IDs

items.description: Filter by specific stop place IDs

parameters.description: Filter by multimodal hierarchy: 'parent' for parent stop places only, 'child' for child stop places only, 'both' for all
parameters.name: multimodal

schema.description: Filter by multimodal hierarchy: 'parent' for parent stop places only, 'child' for child stop places only, 'both' for all

parameters.description: Filter by one or more transport modes
parameters.name: transportModes

schema.description: Filter by one or more transport modes

items.description: Filter by one or more transport modes

parameters.description: Filter by one or more stop place types
parameters.name: stopPlaceTypes

schema.description: Filter by one or more stop place types

items.description: Filter by one or more stop place types

parameters.description: Filter by topographic place IDs (municipalities, counties)
parameters.name: topographicPlaceIds

schema.description: Filter by topographic place IDs (municipalities, counties)

items.description: Filter by topographic place IDs (municipalities, counties)

parameters.description: Filter stop places that contain specific quay IDs
parameters.name: quayIds

schema.description: Filter stop places that contain specific quay IDs

items.description: Filter stop places that contain specific quay IDs

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of stop places. Returns JSON by default, or XML if Accept: application/xml header is specified.

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific stop place by its unique identifier. Returns the latest version including name, location coordinates, transport modes, accessibility features, quays, and associated facilities.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all child stop places for a parent (multimodal) stop place. Parent stop places are hubs that group together multiple related stops, such as different platforms or transport modes at a single location.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the parent stop place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all parking facilities associated with a specific stop place. Includes park-and-ride facilities, bike parking, and other parking options available at or near the stop place.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all scheduled stop points associated with a specific stop place. Returns the logical timetable references that map to this physical location.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place
parameters.name: id

get.summary: Get scheduled stop points for stop place

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific stop place. Useful for tracking changes over time including modifications to location, name, facilities, or operational status.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a stop place by ID and version number. Provides access to the exact state of the stop place data at a specific point in time.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the stop place
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

404.description: Stop place or version not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of tariff zones. DEPRECATED: Use /fare-zones instead.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific tariff zone IDs
parameters.name: ids

parameters.description: Filter by transport authority references
parameters.name: authorityRefs

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of tariff zones

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific tariff zone. DEPRECATED: Use /fare-zones/{id} instead.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the tariff zone
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific tariff zone. DEPRECATED: Use /fare-zones/{id}/versions instead.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the tariff zone
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a tariff zone. DEPRECATED: Use /fare-zones/{id}/versions/{version} instead.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the tariff zone
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

404.description: Tariff zone or version not found

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of topographic places representing administrative and geographic areas such as municipalities, counties, and countries.

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return per page
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination
parameters.name: skip

parameters.description: Filter by specific topographic place IDs
parameters.name: ids

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of topographic places

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific topographic place including name, type, boundaries, and hierarchical relationships.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the topographic place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves all historical versions of a specific topographic place. Tracks changes to boundaries, names, or administrative classifications.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the topographic place
parameters.name: id

get.description: Retrieves a specific historical version of a topographic place by ID and version number.

parameters.description: Unique identifier for the topographic place
parameters.name: id

parameters.description: Version number
parameters.name: version

404.description: Topographic place or version not found

tags.description: Access detailed information about quays (platforms, boarding positions) and their relationship to stop places. Query by ID or retrieve version history.
tags.name: Quays

tags.description: REST API for stop place related NeTEx entities
tags.name: Stop Place Register Entities

tags.description: Query and retrieve stop place information including stations, terminals, bus stops, and ferry ports. Includes filtering by transport mode, location, and other attributes.
tags.name: Stop Places

tags.description: Retrieve scheduled stop points used in route planning and timetables, and their mappings to physical stop places.
tags.name: Scheduled Stop Points

tags.description: Query topographic places (municipalities, counties, countries) and tariff zones for geographic and administrative boundaries.
tags.name: Geographic Areas

tags.description: Access logical groupings of stop places and fare zones for organizational and operational purposes.
tags.name: Groupings

tags.description: Access fare zone definitions and boundaries used for ticket pricing calculations. Query by authority or specific zones.
tags.name: Fare Zones

tags.description: Find parking facilities associated with stop places, including capacity, pricing, and accessibility information.
tags.name: Parking
